statements: SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender, patient_city FROM patient_demographics;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM patient_demographics WHERE patient_city='New York';
SELECT * FROM patient_demographics WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM patient_demographics WHERE patient_gender='Female' ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_age FROM patient_demographics WHERE patient_city='Los Angeles' AND patient_age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM patient_demographics WHERE patient_age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_city FROM patient_demographics WHERE patient_gender = 'Male' ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_gender FROM patient_demographics WHERE patient_city = 'New York' AND patient_age < 50;
SELECT * FROM patient_demographics WHERE patient_age BETWEEN 40 AND 60 ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM patient_demographics ORDER BY patient_age DESC, patient_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, age(date_of_birth) AS age FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT first_name, COUNT(*) AS record_count FROM patients JOIN health_records ON patients.patient_id = health_records.patient_id GROUP BY first_name;
SELECT first_name, last_name, weight, height FROM patients JOIN health_records ON patients.patient_id = health_records.patient_id WHERE height > 160;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'M' ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name ASC
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE ethnicity = 'Asian' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-01-01'
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM patients WHERE first_name LIKE 'A%' AND last_name LIKE 'S%'
SELECT * FROM health_records WHERE weight > 70 AND cholesterol < 200 ORDER BY record_date DESC
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age, city FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT diagnosis_code, diagnosis_description, diagnosis_date FROM diagnoses ORDER BY diagnosis_date DESC;
SELECT treatment_name, treatment_date, treatment_cost FROM treatments WHERE treatment_cost > 1000;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE state = 'California' AND age > 30 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age, city FROM patients WHERE age > 30;

SELECT patients.first_name, patients.last_name, diagnoses.diagnosis_code, treatments.treatment_name FROM patients JOIN diagnoses ON patients.patient_id = diagnoses.patient_id JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM diagnoses WHERE diagnosis_status = 'ongoing';
SELECT city, state, COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients FROM patients GROUP BY city, state;
SELECT * FROM patient_demographics;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, gender, city FROM patient_demographics;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, address, country FROM patient_demographics WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT visit_id, patient_id, visit_date, purpose FROM patient_visits ORDER BY visit_date DESC;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM patient_medication WHERE patient_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM patient_demographics;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM patient_demographics WHERE gender='Male';

SELECT pd.patient_name, pv.visit_date, pc.condition_name FROM patient_demographics pd JOIN patient_visits pv ON pd.patient_id = pv.patient_id JOIN patient_conditions pc ON pd.patient_id = pc.patient_id WHERE pv.visit_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT pm.medication_name, pm.dosage, pm.frequency, pd.patient_name FROM patient_medication pm JOIN patient_demographics pd ON pm.patient_id = pd.patient_id WHERE pm.frequency='Twice daily';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients, MAX(date_of_birth) AS oldest_patient_dob, MIN(date_of_birth) AS youngest_patient_dob FROM patient_demographics;
SELECT * FROM PatientDemographics;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM PatientDemographics WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT city, state, country FROM PatientDemographics WHERE country='USA' ORDER BY state, city;
SELECT * FROM HealthConditions WHERE patient_id=123 ORDER BY diagnosis_date DESC;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM Medications WHERE patient_id=456;
SELECT * FROM PatientDemographics WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender, city FROM PatientDemographics WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT patient_id, condition_name, diagnosis_date FROM HealthConditions ORDER BY diagnosis_date DESC;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM Medications WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT visit_date, doctor_name, visit_reason, diagnosis FROM Visits WHERE patient_id = 3 ORDER BY visit_date ASC;
